title: Passion fruit and chocolate tart
description: Rich chocolate mousse and ganache is balanced with the tangy citrus flavours of passionfruit in this extravagant tart.For this recipe you will need a piping bag fitted with a 1cm/½in plain nozzle and an electric mixer.
ingredients: 270g/9¾oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
1 free-range egg white, for egg wash
orange or yellow gel or paste food colouring
3 large passion fruits, seeds scooped out
3 gelatine leaves, soaked in cold water for 10 minutes
small yellow and purple edible pansies (optional)
